mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELL_INFO ( SELL_SEQ_NO, TITLE, SELL_CONTENTS, REG_DT, CHG_DT, USER_ID )VALUES ( SELL_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{sellContents}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO FILE_INFO ( FILE_SEQ, BRD_SEQ_NO, USER_NO, ORI_NAME, CHG_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, EXTENSION, REG_DT, BRD_KIND ) VALUES ( FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(SELL_SEQ_NO) FROM SELL_INFO), #{userNo}, #{oriName}, #{chgName}, #{fileSize}, #{filePath}, #{extension}, SYSDATE, #{brdKind} )
mapper.select: SELECT SI.SELL_SEQ_NO as sellSeqNo, SI.TITLE as title, SI.SELL_CONTENTS as sellContents, SI.REG_DT as regDt, SI.CHG_DT as chgDt, SI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM SELL_INFO SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID

SELECT SI.SELL_SEQ_NO as sellSeqNo, SI.TITLE as title, SI.SELL_CONTENTS as sellContents, SI.REG_DT as regDt, SI.CHG_DT as chgDt, SI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName, FI.CHG_NAME as chgName, FI.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq FROM SELL_INFO SI, FILE_INFO FI, USER_INFO UI WHERE SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID AND SI.SELL_SEQ_NO = #{sellSeqNo} AND SI.SELL_SEQ_NO = FI.BRD_SEQ_NO AND FI.BRD_KIND = 'sell'

SELECT SI.SELL_SEQ_NO as sellSeqNo, SI.TITLE as title, SI.SELL_CONTENTS as sellContents, SI.REG_DT as regDt, SI.CHG_DT as chgDt, SI.USER_ID as userId, UI.USER_NAME as userName FROM SELL_INFO SI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON SI.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID WHERE SI.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_INFO SET CHG_NAME = #{chgName}, ORI_NAME = #{oriName}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath}, EXTENSION = #{extension} WHERE FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
